SQLSatement.sql:
BEGIN merge into MethodStatementConditional a using ( select @ConditionalID ConditionalID, @StatementID StatementID, @MethodID MethodID, @ConditionType ConditionType, @ParameterName ParameterName, @ExpectBehavior ExpectBehavior, @CompareValue CompareValue ) b on a.ConditionalID = b.ConditionalID when matched then update set a.ConditionType =b.ConditionType, a.ParameterName =b.ParameterName, a.ExpectBehavior =b.ExpectBehavior, a.CompareValue =b.CompareValue when not matched then insert (StatementID, MethodID, ConditionType, ParameterName, ExpectBehavior, CompareValue) values (b.StatementID, b.MethodID, b.ConditionType, b.ParameterName, b.ExpectBehavior, b.CompareValue);
if (@ConditionalID=0) begin SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ConditionalID end else begin SELECT @ConditionalID AS ConditionalID end END
